adDetails: Hello! I am a cinematographer that has recently moved to the Bay Area. I am looking to set up and build my client base with weddings this summer. I typically do music videos and promotional videos. I have a unique and fresh style and I want to tell your story! What does this all mean for you? It means that you will be getting a fresh faced professional for an affordable price! I will shoot and edit your wedding in the summer of 2014 in a style like the one below for $999. http://vimeo.com/93243404 Check out some of my other videos here! http://youtu.be/NCzC_docxCk https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h4yFli0e0tM www.FaceBook.com/IanPowellDP
